inclusion.criterion: Patient who are willing to participate in follow-up survey 3 months after completion of pulmonary rehabilitation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who complete rehabilitation for at least 8 weeks.
inclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and decreased appetite, PO intake, energy level at home.
